Package model.classic

Class GameClassic

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Game
model.classic.GameClassic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameClassic extends Game
This class logically represents the classic game mode. The latter follows the official rules of the game. Contains the game loop that manages all the possible game dynamics (e.g. game state, turns, etc.) and communicates them to the view with the observer pattern.
Author:
MP

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      manages all the possible game dynamics - check if and who won the game - manages player turns - manages the drawing of cards - plays sound effects in the appropriate case - check if player said UNO correctly - handles the dynamic of doubt with wildcards +4 It communicates them to the view with the observer pattern.
      Specified by:
      gameLoop in class Game

    • getDeck

      public List<Card> getDeck()
      if the deck's size is zero it refills the deck with the played cards else it returns the deck
